title: PK – Dice Color Target (5-Roll Format)
target_task: Influence a custom die to land on assigned target color as often as possible across five rolls.

phases.name: Pre-roll prime
phases.instruction: Fix target color in mind. Rehearse the die landing with target face up.

per_roll_structure.label: Freeze + lock
per_roll_structure.cue: As it settles: hold target outcome.

phases.name: Post-run reset
phases.instruction: No analysis spirals—log result, then detach.
